column5: Oldest son and I hit the river this morning for a few hours fishing. He has not done the river before,but after reading and hearing about yesturdays adventure,he wanted to try it.So were on the water by 5:30 this morning,only got a few hours to fish. I decide to try new areas and stay away from where Terry and I caught yesturday.So we head alittle futher down the river and start fish,n. Ryan hooks up with the same set up as Terry did yesturday,but went with a diiferent colour and bigger hook.  . I had to rig up a new jig,so I went with blue jig with the blue/lime Craw. Were only into it for 5 minutes and ryans boats the fisrt one. Cool he says,this is wild.LOL Alittle ways down,fish on,nope not me but him again.Ok Im getting behind all ready. Fish a good lenght for an houe and land 3 small fish.Yep him again.Son 5 dad 0.  Ok now it,s time to get the game face on and low and behold,dont he boat another.Sheech. Not to worry though my turn did come and I put the boy in his place,well that was until he boated a bigger one.  Well in 4 hours we boated 9 fish,two were real nice fish others were 2 pounders+. I did give that spot a try again Terry to see if that brute was there,but must of been still sleeping.LOL   Heres some pics from this mornings outing.        The pig of the morning,caught by who else,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
Geez those are some nice fish...one's I only dream about  Way to go guys...  Maureen
very nice... so what is the name of that piece of plastic I was using yesterday
That's great!!Some good lookin bass there..Congrats  BM
From the looks of those girls .. I would have thought you were fishing in Florida.  Great fish !
That last one is a hog!  WTG!
Look's like a great day!  My girlfriend out fished me today too lol
Wow!! Some nice hawgs there!  Great report and pics!
Nice Bass. Looks like you taught him well!!
Beauty Bass B, good stuff.  Joey
Excellent report Brian!  That certainly is a pig that your son got.  Kudos to him!
